## Natural history notes

Male Citrine Forktails (Ischnura hastata) can be identified by their mostly yellow abdomen with some black markings. Female Citrine Forktails coloring can be orange or olive. Citrine Forktails are one of the smallest damselflies in the United States. Their primary food source includes small flying insects.
